entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
